metadata.description: The ultimate death sentence in Battleworld! There's a place that's so dangerous it's walled off from the rest of Battleworld; where wild zombies feast on those who've been banished for crimes against the state, and where cold, mechanical Ultrons destroy anything that's human. Pity those who get caught between the two, for their death won't be fast and painless!
metadata.name: Age of Ultron vs. Marvel Zombies
